website_summaries.verdict: The gun rack itself is sturdy and well-made, but the mounting hardware could be improved.
pros: Unique design that fits all shotguns and rifles
Made from steel with rubbery coating to protect guns from moisture
Fits easily into any space and budget
cons: Included mounting hardware is a little flimsy, so you may want to supply your own

customer_reviews.title: I could have done a better weld job in 4th grade while blindfolded
customer_reviews.text: Product services its purpose, but the backing plates are not were near square with the basket portion of the mount. One of the mounting holes on the top piece interferes with the wire/holder portion. So when you're using a drill to put in a screw, your chuck is going to hit the wire/holder portion and mar it up. You could get a 6" extension to your drill bit, but will make it harder to drill into a stud.
customer_reviews.author: FulmarTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Flexible mounting options, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I have limited storage space for rifles (no room for a safe), but insist on them being locked (even though this silly state doesn't have storage requirements); so I mount them with these and run a locking steel cable though the trigger guards. These work extremely well on the inside of my (solid) gun closet door. Separate top and bottom pieces can be spaced to accommodate different barrel lengths. I bought two, and liked them enough to buy more and make them my primary rifle storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: MGruson

customer_reviews.title: Good for home defense gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for keeping that home defense gun nearby at night. The plasticized finish shouldn't wear on the finish of the firearm. My only complaint is that the buttstock of my AR doesn't sit very nicely in it due to the spacing of the metal rods that makeup the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Air Rifle
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to hang my air rifle in my office. This product did just the thing. Will order again. Delivery was on point. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RENO VILLA

customer_reviews.title: Good Mount. Seems Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to mount an air rifle to the garage wall. It weighs about 10 pounds with the scope and mounting hardware, so not a light package to mount by any means. All the metal of the backers is rubber coated, and it appears to be of pretty good quality. The weld position on the one bottom bracket was off a bit, but no big deal. The hardware they supply for drywall mounting is pretty cheap, but just use your own and you'll be fine. Good mount. I'll probably grab a couple more for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: OK, but some issues.
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm not impressed. I ordered 2 of these and they arrived today in one box. Both were in individual plastic bags but only one had hardware (screws, washers & anchors) and a screw was missing from that one. Also, one of the two bases was bent, but easily bent back in place. I'm sure they will work okay as they are pretty simple brackets, but the lack of care in packaging and inspection indicates other issues exist with this manufacturer. A little more care and attention to detail would have been nice. The time I set aside to install these now has to be sent hunting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Really handy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, great concept. I did have a little trouble fitting the muzzle of a shotgun that has a tac light on it through the top part, but it finally fit. Personally, I used some heavier hardware to put them up than what is included. I'm sure it was fine, but I absolutely did not want these things to fall (the results could be extremely bad). Also added a pad of double-stick tape at each end. Now they feel like you could do chin-ups on them. I will definitely order more of these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: T. Dominy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice....
customer_reviews.text: Installed on bedroom wall and holds my heavy custom AR15 very nice. The rifle stays in the holder securely and it’s easily and quickly accessible as well. Definitely a great product. Buying another.
customer_reviews.author: iBuyStuffOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed but somewhat functional
customer_reviews.text: Item is bent and poorly welded. The butt of your rifle/shotgun will not lay flat, judging by other reviews this is common. I suppose this is fine for someone who isn’t concerned about aesthetics but the quality control is mediocre at best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got some unused vertical space that needs a rifle?  This is the ticket.  An easy mod prevents marring of the barrel.
customer_reviews.text: This vertical gun holder was easy to install, and it's super easy to use. Find a stud in the wall, attach the two parts, install gun. I added some split cable tubing to the upper support bar. The tubing prevents any cosmetic issues when the gun's barrel goes in and out. Search Amazon for this: 1/4" Split Nylon Wire Loom Tubing - 25 Feet - Black If you've got some unused vertical space, this is a great rack. Be sure to shop around. The same item is listed a couple of times with a different title and price.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley

customer_reviews.title: perfect quick access
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Cosmetics are fine including the welds and coating. I wall mounted three to wall studs behind the room doors. Easy access but out of sight. Comes with hardware for hollow core doors or sections of wall without studs. I even modified the base of one for slip in the Butt of a KSG shotgun. So, even a Fat Boy Shotty can be racked and ready.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I'm a minimalist sort of guy, and this is that. I wouldn't put a premium "Safe queen" gun in it, as it seems it might be a little hard on the finish, but for an inexpensive HD shotgun like mine, it's just the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Kosteck

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty but worth the money and very functional
customer_reviews.text: First off, this only gets 3 stars because I think that for the price-you get what you paid for. Nothing more and nothing less. It is very functional, but the craftsmanship is shoddy. It looks like the worst student in a high school metal shop made it. The welding is awful. The metal tubing on the top bracket is not even level. Mine looked so rough out of the packaging that I even hit part of it with a file and sand paper. Then I painted it to match the hardware in my battle closet. With all that said I am still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: damian

customer_reviews.title: Suggestion, get with TAC-MAG. I used their magnet ...
customer_reviews.text: Suggestion, get with TAC-MAG. I used their magnet mount instead of your top bracket. Securely holds my shotgun and easier access for home defense.
customer_reviews.author: DEVLON WALKER

customer_reviews.title: The product is sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose I intended. I doctored mine up a bit with some rubber foam to proctect my weapon from scratching. The product is sturdy and functional, but I would suggest they include some sort of padded material in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McAnelly

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Gun mount pieces are made from heavy duty materials but the welding joints are below average. General appearance is not good because of the welding. Also, mounting hardware was MISSING and not included as promised. Because of missing parts and the general appearance of this gun mounting system, I will only give it TWO STARS.....
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Bad welding
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose by holding my gun on the wall. However, the welding looks like it was done by a four-year-old, so everything is crooked and out of square. The seller did offer to refund/replace the item, however I had to pay the return shipping which was almost the cost of the product, so I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoomin2u2

customer_reviews.title: Strong and serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived slightly bent but was simple to straighten (taking away a rating star). Strong and serves its purpose well. It is functional not fashionable but that is not a concern as ours is mounted to the backside of a solid closet door where we lock up our bedside shotgun during the day.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Love these and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love these and easy to install. Love the idea that it comes in two separate pieces as my weapons are different sizes. I can hang them at different levels and it gives me the freedom to put the mount in a small area. I have limited space and a full rack would not fit into the areas that i had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Combs

customer_reviews.title: Nice protective finish.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily and included the mounting hardware. Be sure to use the included washers when mounting. There is a nice protective finish that protects the surface of your selected weapon. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: A super value
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed, and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: AJ K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for easy access
customer_reviews.text: Nice gun rack for the price. I wanted something that would mount my rifle while still giving me easy access to it and this really fit the bill. It's not the most beefy thing around, but for the price I really can't complain. If you're wanting to display you're prized rifle, or if you want to secure it, this probably isn't what you're looking for. For what I needed though, this was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had to find a way to get my hubby's BB gun off my dining room table! Installed behind my dining room curtain ( OUT OF VIEW FINALLY).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Penta

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: LCG

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and tactical
customer_reviews.text: I got this beast mounted on the wall next to my front door with a shotgun in it. You might be asking yourself, "Oh deerie, won't that offend Bob and Susie down the street when they enter your humble abode?” The answer to that question my friend, is a big confident "No," because if you throw a jacket on top of the weapon, BOOM, you got yourself a coat rack! Enjoy =)
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Works great for long rifles not so great for ar but worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ryan horton

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not compatible with Shockwave
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However is not compatible with the Remington Shockwave without some modification.
customer_reviews.author: C_Loe

customer_reviews.title: works but needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Top mount allows gun to flop back and forth.I ended up strapping rubber in it to protect the barrel!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Holds great
customer_reviews.text: Holds great. Great coating so it doesnt mark the going in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Stormtrooperhityou

customer_reviews.title: worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works pretty well. The only con I could find was that there is no way to get your weapon out of this silently. Other than that....outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for sure
customer_reviews.text: For the price, easy installation. You can’t beat it, at all. I’d buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dilan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, it's pretty much exactly what you're expecting if you're looking at the picture. It's covered with a SLIGHTLY soft coating. It doesn't feel squishy to the touch, but it's enough that it won't scratch anything.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Greta item
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the rifle to hang at the wall
customer_reviews.author: martin vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Good mount
customer_reviews.text: We mounted a personal defense shotgun near our front door with this mount. It was easy to install and allows us quick access to the gun. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: golf nut

customer_reviews.title: Stud
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, simple easy to install and does what it is designed to do, hold the weapon in place! Quick access if needed. Nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 star rating if the price was a little better. I only have a 11 gun safe so ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given a 5 star rating if the price was a little better. I only have a 11 gun safe so I put the BB gun and shotguns on the wall next to my safe (with trigger locks of course) and they look great with the mounts.
customer_reviews.author: sstruck94

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: Good place for my Mossie! Keeps her at the ready in my living room while I'm watching TV. However, the bayonet lug hangs up on it. Would like a wide "V" shaped piece of metal on one side of the upper part to prevent hang-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple and sturdy way to hang my side ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, simple and sturdy way to hang my side by side. It installs easily and holds the gun without damage to the wood or metal. If you want a quick, easy way to access your weapon, buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: LegalArtist

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect. Can be easily removed for use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rack to place just inside a closet for my shotgun. This was perfect. Can be easily removed for use.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and easy to install. Mount lower piece first and play with location for top if you have a weapon with goats rings or flashlight on end.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J Schoenbein

customer_reviews.title: Well built and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my pellet gun where I can easily reach for it when varmints need attention!
customer_reviews.author: Albert Larochelle

customer_reviews.title: At arms length
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily and looks good. Amazon never disappoints me. I have me shotgun on the wall ready for action. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: It will work fine
customer_reviews.text: The rack has a good coating which will protect the gun. The piece that holds the stock is large enough to handle a larger gun. The rack will work just fine for quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Maineman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these and used them to turn my laundry closet into a mini personal armory. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for mounting a small collection!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fully custom mounting length for any long gun. Comes with hardware for mounting on drywall. Sturdy construction. I installed these on a friends safe. All his long rifles are now organized and mounted on his door! Freaking awesome! Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: works good and can use on all guns and shotguns, sometimes the top piece is not wide enough for a raised sight. Just set it up off set style and rest gun against it that way.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mancari

customer_reviews.title: usa gunclub mount anywhere single gun rack
customer_reviews.text: came quickly is as described. used for home security12 gage, that's also tactical, had to modify top half so gun could be removed quickly. will work excellent for any weapon without anything attached to upper 8" of barrel.
customer_reviews.author: river raider 67

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not pretty but functional. Easily holds my coach side by side shotgun in it's "special" place.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great universal rack for the money. I have an AR mounted to my rack.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little single gun holder for the dollars
customer_reviews.text: Great holder for the money - only rated 4 start as the product is slightly "rougher" than I expected - but for the $$$ it is very useful
customer_reviews.author: Fort Loramie

customer_reviews.title: Goes up easy and holds my perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Goes up easy and holds my perfectly. Like others, I found the hoops attached to the back plates crooked. I just used my level on the hoops and did care if the back plates were a little crooked on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the wall in our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on the wall in our bedroom. A nice way to display a shotgun if you have limited space, instead of those bulky cabinets. We always keep the lock on ours still.
customer_reviews.author: YourDoinItAgain

customer_reviews.title: Mounted my shotgun in the foyer closet using the drywall ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted my shotgun in the foyer closet using the drywall kit included. My firearm has a flashlight and sling mounted and this got in the way a bit for slipping the shotgun up and out of the mount, but I got used to it quick.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, compact, for something to mount a firearm out of the way without having a bulk multiple gun rack its a must.
customer_reviews.author: anthony s camcho

customer_reviews.title: Stays on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. It fits most shotguns and rifles. Make sure you measure your gun before you hang it.
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Comes with drywall hardware but I used wood screws to hit a stud behind the drywall. Easy to install. Not fancy but does the job for my 3006 with scope.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, perfect for that long gun! Simple but efficient!
customer_reviews.author: faye bentley

customer_reviews.title: Depends
customer_reviews.text: Welding is rough, and the mounts are uneven. Good for straight utility. Will not be pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install wherever you wish
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Works as described. Installs in minutes, with provided hardware. Easy to install wherever you wish. Can accommodate multiple firearm platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McGillick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes easy access to my shot gun for home defense purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Carter

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised It Is
customer_reviews.text: Yep, have no problems with this product. Well-made & good value.
customer_reviews.author: Blind finger

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect gauge metal that supports my Mossberg 88 with 18.5" or 28" barrel. AAAAAA+++++ seller.
customer_reviews.author: JimN

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome easy to install took me 15 minutes if that
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Provides easy access to a firearm when mounted on the inside of a safe door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the vertical design
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very practical. Sturdy construction and easy to mount. Now I have my shotgun nice and handy!
customer_reviews.author: THE Brian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very functional for hiding rifles behind areas of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'll order more
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Product. Goes up easy, holds rifle securely and shows it off very well.
customer_reviews.author: dawgfan56

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well built. I don't see anything else that compares in quality, utility and price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Farley

customer_reviews.title: Very easy wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and use.I mounted it to the inside of my closet where it was out of sight yet easy to get to.
customer_reviews.author: John C Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great and fit perfect. Bought as a gift. Would recommend to anyone. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Great mount!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to for our BB gun. Put in garage works great! Easy to mount very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BIGDOGGIEDEE2

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, easy to mount. I had to cushion the upper and lower mounts where the firearm rests. Easy to do yet would have been nice if this was part of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice vertical gun mount
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for his birthday for his pellet gun. It was easy to mount and is exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Works and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and gets the job done. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Corey Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: easy installation. looks great on the
customer_reviews.text: adjustable to fit any size long gun. easy installation. looks great on the wall
customer_reviews.author: revdoug

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This gun holder is perfect for my application. It keeps my rifle accessible and out of sight. It's a great verticle mount rifle rack.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installs easy and for its purpose. It works really well. Ordered more
customer_reviews.author: George Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and just as described I mounted on wall holds my shotgun very well And is ready when I need it Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tberry

customer_reviews.title: storeasy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gun mount for closet. Easy to install because all hardware included. Protective coating on mount protects surfaces from scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for barns
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. No two are the same. Obviously handmade without the aid of forming jigs to suggest consistency. Sloppy welding with beads that distort the backs so they will never mount completely flat. If they were advertised as accessories for a rustic bunk house, I would have known what to expect... But my order was meant for a nicely finished back living area, and is totally inappropriate. My mistake.. Will put up a couple that are hidden behind open doors, but the others will go in the trash...
customer_reviews.author: P. Petty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: met all expectations... mounted by the window in my shop...
customer_reviews.author: susan simpson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Could not be used on my Polaris ETX as it would not tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and does what is needed, nice thing is that your rifle is easy to access if needed. Took less than 5 minutes to hang. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: E-ONSALE AmeriGun Club Easy Use Mount Anywhere Shotgun or Rifle Rack
product_meta.description: For easy access to rifle, this mount anywhere rifle rack mounts to any surface. Fits all rifles and shotguns. Strong steel construction, soft rubbery coating hydrophobic plastic coated. Rack will not collect moisture and protects the finish on guns from getting scratched. Mounting screws included.
feature_bullets: Mount to any surface - walls, UTV's, hunting blinds, etc
Strong steel construction with soft rubbery coating to protect guns from moisture
